name: AF Guard+
key_benefits: AI-Based Wearable for Atrial Fibrillation Monitoring and Prediction
description: Advanced wearable device with integrated medication compartment for continuous heart health monitoring. Features include: AI-powered heart monitoring, Atrial fibrillation detection, Integrated medication storage, Wrist-worn design.

name: Portable ECG Monitor
key_benefits: Monitors heart rhythm and detects irregularities
description: Handheld ECG monitor with Bluetooth sync to mobile devices.

name: Digital Stethoscope
key_benefits: Enhanced sound for accurate heart and lung auscultation
description: Electronic stethoscope with noise reduction and recording feature.

name: Otoscope Diagnostic Tool
key_benefits: Examines ear canal and eardrum
description: LED otoscope with reusable specula and carry case.

name: Infrared Vein Finder
key_benefits: Helps locate veins for injection or IV
description: Portable infrared device ideal for nurses and phlebotomists.

name: Medical Headlamp
key_benefits: Provides focused light during medical examinations
description: Adjustable headband with high-intensity LED light.

name: Fetal Doppler
key_benefits: Monitors fetal heartbeat at home
description: Safe and easy-to-use fetal monitor for expectant mothers.

name: Blood Lancet Device
key_benefits: Used for drawing small blood samples
description: Adjustable lancing device with multiple depth settings.

name: Medical Penlight
key_benefits: Used for pupil examination and wound inspection
description: Aluminum body penlight with pupil gauge chart.

name: Portable Nebulizer
key_benefits: Converts medicine into mist for easy inhalation
description: Compact and silent nebulizer ideal for asthma and respiratory issues.

name: Digital Reflex Hammer
key_benefits: Tests neurological reflexes
description: Ergonomic design with LED light and vibration alert.

name: Blood Glucose Monitor Kit
key_benefits: Measures blood sugar levels accurately
description: Includes monitor, strips, lancet device, and carry case.

name: Sphygmomanometer Manual
key_benefits: Traditional blood pressure measurement tool
description: Manual BP cuff with stethoscope for accurate readings.

name: Urine Test Strips 100pcs
key_benefits: Quick testing for pH, glucose, protein, etc.
description: Ideal for home health monitoring and clinics.

name: Medical Tuning Fork Set

name: Oxygen Concentrator Mini

description: Quiet, compact, and easy to operate at home.

name: Digital Weighing Scale
key_benefits: Measures body weight with high precision
description: Tempered glass platform and LED display.

name: Tongue Depressors 100pcs

name: Disposable Surgical Gown

description: Breathable, water-resistant, and latex-free.

name: Medical Grade Thermometer Strips

description: Professional-grade toolset for ENT examinations.

name: Digital Baby Scale
